headline: Citizens Financial Strengthens Advisory Platform With Matrix Deal
summary: CFG is set to expand its advisory platform through the planned acquisition of Matrix, expanding expertise in Downstream Energy & Convenience Retail.

raw.headline: Citizens Financial Strengthens Advisory Platform With Matrix Deal
raw.summary: CFG is set to expand its advisory platform through the planned acquisition of Matrix, expanding expertise in Downstream Energy & Convenience Retail.

headline: Matrix Capital Markets acquired by Citizens Financial
summary: The c-store M&A advisory firm has coordinated over 70 deals since 2021, including Sunoco’s purchase of Jernigan Oil and Jacksons’ buyout of Redwood Market.
